results.title: Association of Metformin Use with Iron Deficiency Anemia in Urban Chinese Patients with Type 2 Diabetes
results.text_hl: However, the relationship between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Iron_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018798 @@@IDA@@@ remains unclear.
